beforeHooks.code:
effects = new src_1.TokenEffects([
    [src_1.Token.ELDER_SIGN, new src_1.Modifier(1)],
    [src_1.Token.PLUS_ONE, new src_1.Modifier(1)],
    [src_1.Token.ZERO, new src_1.Modifier(0)],
    [src_1.Token.MINUS_ONE, new src_1.Modifier(-1)],
    [src_1.Token.MINUS_TWO, new src_1.Modifier(-2)],
    [src_1.Token.MINUS_FOUR, new src_1.Modifier(-4)],
    [src_1.Token.AUTOFAIL, new src_1.Autofail()],
    [src_1.Token.BLESS, new src_1.Modifier(2, true)],
    [src_1.Token.CURSE, new src_1.Modifier(-2, true)]
]);

tests.title: returns 0.5 when pulling 1 token if half the tokens results in a success

tests.title: takes into account tokens with a redraw effect when pulling multiple tokens
tests.fullTitle: Odds functions odds takes into account tokens with a redraw effect when pulling multiple tokens
tests.code:
var bag = new src_1.Bag([
    src_1.Token.PLUS_ONE,
    src_1.Token.MINUS_ONE,
    src_1.Token.MINUS_TWO,
    src_1.Token.CULTIST
]);
/* Possible draws are in the table below
 *
 * | 1st pull | 2nd pull | 3rd pull | Result | Probability |
 * | +1       | -1       |          | +0     | 1/12        |
 * | +1       | -2       |          | -1     | 1/12        |
 * | +1       | Cultist  | -1       | -1     | 1/24        |
 * | +1       | Cultist  | -2       | -2     | 1/24        |
 * | -1       | +1       |          | +0     | 1/12        |
 * | -1       | -2       |          | -3     | 1/12        |
 * | -1       | Cultist  | +1       | -1     | 1/24        |
 * | -1       | Cultist  | -2       | -4     | 1/24        |
 * | -2       | +1       |          | -1     | 1/12        |
 * | -2       | -1       |          | -3     | 1/12        |
 * | -2       | Cultist  | +1       | -2     | 1/24        |
 * | -2       | Cultist  | -1       | -4     | 1/24        |
 * | Cultist  | +1       | -1       | -1     | 1/24        |
 * | Cultist  | +1       | -2       | -2     | 1/24        |
 * | Cultist  | -1       | +1       | -1     | 1/24        |
 * | Cultist  | -1       | -2       | -4     | 1/24        |
 * | Cultist  | -2       | +1       | -2     | 1/24        |
 * | Cultist  | -2       | -1       | -4     | 1/24        |
 *
 * Odds of success depending on difficulty is then :
 *
 * | Result | Probability |
 * | -4     | 4/24        |
 * | -3     | 4/24        |
 * | -2     | 4/24        |
 * | -1     | 8/24        |
 * | 0      | 4/24        |
 */
chai_1.expect(src_1.odds(2, bag, effects, src_1.success(0))).to.be.closeTo(4 / 24, 0.01, "when equal");
chai_1.expect(src_1.odds(2, bag, effects, src_1.success(1))).to.be.closeTo(4 / 24 + 8 / 24, 0.01, "when over by 1");
chai_1.expect(src_1.odds(2, bag, effects, src_1.success(2))).to.be.closeTo(4 / 24 + 8 / 24 + 4 / 24, 0.01, "when over by 2");
chai_1.expect(src_1.odds(2, bag, effects, src_1.success(3))).to.equal(4 / 24 + 8 / 24 + 4 / 24 + 4 / 24, "when over by 3");
chai_1.expect(src_1.odds(2, bag, effects, src_1.success(4))).to.be.closeTo(1, 0.01, "when over by 4");
